name: Grilled Polenta with Strawberries
author: Bren
summary: Grand Marnier® adds a delicate flavour to an old (adult) family favorite. Prepare the berries and allow them to sit on the counter, for no longer than 30 minutes, while you prepare the rest of the meal.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place the sliced strawberries into a small bowl, add sugar and brandy, and stir to coat
Let stand while you prepare the polenta
Cut polenta into eight 1/2- to 3/4-inch-thick slices
Lightly brush the slices with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly spray the grate
Grill the polenta slices for 7 to 10 minutes per side, turning once
Place 2 slices on a dessert plate and top with 1/4 of the strawberry mixture
